long_description: Made of light and airy organic cotton, the women's Patagonia Brookgreen Shirt features a colorful checkered print that's perfect for throwing on over a swimsuit or wearing on a hike in hot weather. Button-front shirt has darts at the bust for a feminine fit. Long sleeves roll up and secure with tabs. Patagonia Brookgreen Shirt features a single chest pocket and a shirttail hem.
